definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield

sentences.english: Lynx have longer legs and much broader paws. This helps them charge around in snow.
sentences.chinese: 山貓腿較長，腳掌較寬，協助它們在雪地中衝刺。

sentences.english: I raised one of his paws.
Wrap a strap around sole of the foot and hold with straight arms.
sentences.chinese: 將瑜伽帶纏繞在腳掌上，雙臂伸直保持。

sentences.english: Mike: They even have special insoles to support the arches of my feet.
sentences.chinese: 皮鞋一般在鞋底回油軟墊，可以支撐腳掌的拱形部位。

sentences.english: The medial plantar flap is an excellent choice in the reconstruction of palmar and plantar areas.
sentences.chinese: 對於重建手掌與腳掌，是一個非常好的選擇。

sentences.english: The forepaws cover surface layers below provide comfort and lightweight liners permeability.
sentences.chinese: 下面的外層覆蓋前腳掌安慰和輕質內襯的通透性。

sentences.english: He removes a thorn from a lion's paw.
sentences.chinese: 他除去了獅子腳掌上的一根刺。

sentences.english: Usually five hoof-like toenails grow on each foot.
sentences.chinese: 每個腳掌上通常長着五個鉤狀趾甲。

sentences.english: They bastinadoed the criminal on the soles of the feet and on the buttocks.
sentences.chinese: 他們對罪犯的腳掌施笞蹠刑和對其臀部施棒刑。

sentences.english: The front foot is fully on the oor the back foot is only on ball of foot.
sentences.chinese: 前面的腳整個都在地板上，而後面的腳僅是腳掌。

sentences.english: As he slams the spade back into the base of the trough, she turns away on the dry sole of her foot.
sentences.chinese: 他把鐵鍬擲回溝底，她蹬着乾巴巴的腳掌，轉身走了。

sentences.english: Your legs and feet feel heavy and limp.
sentences.chinese: 你的雙腿和腳掌感到非常地沉重和無力。

sentences.english: The rash does not itch and it is usually located on the palms of the hands and soles of the feet.
sentences.chinese: 這些疹子並不發癢，通常侷限於手掌心和腳掌底。

sentences.english: Seek the remedial method of sole lacerate and common sense?
sentences.chinese: 求腳掌割破的治療方法和常識？

sentences.english: The foot naturally forms a bridge between the two.
sentences.chinese: 腳在腳掌和腳後跟之間自然形成了一個橋形結構。

sentences.english: Barefoot runners land on the balls of their feet.
sentences.chinese: 而光腳跑步者是前腳掌着地。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
